# Three comments

1. Give three comments about R. 
2. They can be negative, positive or neutral.
3. They can be in Portuguese too.

Please use the following format:
```
## Your Name (or GitHub Username)

+ Comment 1 here
+ Comment 2 here
+ Comment 3 here
```
